name: In re TRANSFER OF ATTORNEY to Inactive Status Pursuant to Pa.R.D.E. 219(k)(l)

judges: Madame Justice BALDWIN did not participate in this matter.
parties: In re TRANSFER OF ATTORNEY to Inactive Status Pursuant to Pa.R.D.E. 219(k)(l).

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 7th day of April, 2006, it is ORDERED that John A. Lee is hereby transferred to inactive status as a member of the Bar of this Commonwealth pursuant to Rule 219(k)(l), Pa.R.D.E. Respondent shall comply -with Rule 217, Pa.R.D.E.
Madame Justice BALDWIN did not participate in this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
897 A.2d 1164
In re TRANSFER OF ATTORNEY to Inactive Status Pursuant to Pa.R.D.E. 219(k)(l).
No. 1136 Disciplinary Docket No. 3.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 7, 2006.
